name: Zeyu Sun 0004
content: Zeyu Sun | ISCAS | Institute of Software, Chinese Academy of Sciences Zeyu Sun Toggle navigation Zeyu Sun Google Scholar GitHub About Me Resume Honors & Awards About Me Zeyu Sun (孙泽宇) Associate Researcher (Associate Professor) Institute of Software, Chinese Academy of Sciences Zeyu Sun received his Ph.D. in Computer Science from Peking University, advised by Prof. Lu Zhang and Prof. Yingfei Xiong in 2022. Email: zeyu DOT zys AT gmail DOT com Research Interests Software Testing; Code Generation; Code Representation; Deep Learning Testing 欢迎有读硕/博意向的同学与我联系。也欢迎同学们来我这里实习（发论文）。 Publications [TOSEM'25] Do Advanced Language Models Eliminate the Need for Prompt Engineering in Software Engineering?
